body.name: Willz WTH1215S4MC15 Countertop Toaster Oven, Pull Down Door Handle, 5 Cooking Programs, Minutes Timer, 1500W/120Volts, 42L Manual, Stainless Steel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 1 min
features: 1500W & 5 COOKING FUNCTIONS - Willz 1.5 cu.ft, 1500w toaster oven with its stainless steel look can complement your kitchen decor. it offers 5 cooking programs including toast, broil, bake, keep warm, convection.

42L LARGE CAPACITY & SPACE-SAVING DESIGN - With 42L interior space, the toaster oven fits 6 slices of toast, 13’’ pizza. It allows you to prepare ample gourmet food for the whole family. Besides, owing to compact and sleek design, it can be placed on your countertop without taking much space.
ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL - Willz toaster oven can adjust temperature ranging between 90°f–450°f. It can maintain consistent temperature and minimized temperature fluctuations.

THREE CONTROL KNOBS & INDICATOR LIGHT - It has timer knob, function knob and thermostat knob - simple controls for you to select the cooking functions. Indicator light provides better visibility while cooking without opening the door.
PACKAGE INCLUDES - 1 x toast oven; 1 x food tray; 1 x crumb tray; 1 x oven rack; 1 x power cord.
body.description: This Willz 1.5 Cu.Ft, 1500 watts countertop toaster oven with its stainless steel look can complement your kitchen with different styles. This thoughtful toast oven offers 5 cooking functions, including Toast, Broil, Bake, Keep Warm and Convection. It is convenient to set the time and temperature. Besides, indicator light provides better visibility while cooking without opening the door.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Willz 1.5 Cu. Ft., 1500W countertop toaster oven with its stainless-steel exterior complements any kitchen décor. This thoughtful toaster oven offers 5 cooking functions including; Toast, Broil, Bake, Keep Warm and Convection. It is convenient to use with separate time, temperature and function dials, as well as an indicator light that provides better visibility while cooking without opening the door. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works great
reviews.reviewText: This was the 3rd oven I purchased. I kept this one as it works great. If you are looking for an oven that fits on your counter, this is great. I can easily fit my 9 x 13 baking pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars More of a warmer than an oven
reviews.reviewText: Burns toast when you aren't looking and won't brown anything else, leaving food greasy and flavourless. Also SO big I had to move all but the Keurig off of the only countertop it will fit on. Plug was too short to fit it anywhere else near a kitchen outlet. Would not buy again nor recommend. 2 stars because it technically is in working order, just very bad at its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not heat well
reviews.reviewText: I cook fish at 450 degrees. Can't get this thing past 350 degrees. I bought a oven thermometer to double check. Would NOT purchase again! I did not discover the defect until after the return date had passed. Piece of junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I sent it back wasn’t what I wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No lo recomiendo
reviews.reviewText: a los 3 meses ya casi no calienta, y ha tenido poco uso.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn't last a year.
reviews.reviewText: Edit: 2/28/23 It didn't even last one year and it's dead.This thing cooks really well. I've only done a 12" pizza, hot dogs, hamburger patties, and I make my own corn tortilla chips in it. Really beats my smaller toaster oven that I retired. Planning on doing cornbread soon. The fan is a tiny bit loud but doesn't bother me and only comes on on bake and convection. It's a lot like a real oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice overall. It only takes a couple minutes longer on bake mode for most items. Still learning the convection times a little bit. Toast mode is about spot on. Warm mode is okay so far. It’s lighter than it looks. It’s about 95% great for the cons of this oven. Only negative things for this oven is minimal. 1 the door does open a little lower than I like. 2 the font next to the buttons could be bolder. 3 it’s a little lighter cooking on the front right side close to the door; so definitely rotate if need be. 4 my rack times bent a little on the first seasoning of it and it could come with 2 racks instead of one. That’s it for the negatives and easy enough to deal with honestly. Easy to clean if you clean after each use. Works really well so far.Here’s the best tip I’ll give you. It says to run it at full 450 degrees for 20 minutes before use. From other reviews I did not do this. I ran it at 400 degrees for 15 minutes and it worked great. No odors and it saved my rack from bending more I believe. I use this more than my main oven now as it’s easier and quicker to cook most smaller to medium items. If cooking a pizza on a pan I recommend 3-4 minutes longer but watch the top of it as well. Potatoes whole takes about 10 minutes longer. Very happy overall. 4.3 stars!
